item.title: Adding items, to a 371
item.dc:creator: @Abcscape Abcscape
item.description:
@Abcscape wrote:

I need help adding items to a 371 client. I add the model to class8.java.

if(i == 14073) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 935; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 935; class8.anInt174 = 4158; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -6; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt204 = 14; class8.anInt165 = 4181; class8.anInt200 = 7178; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Attack cape"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's an attack cape.".getBytes(); }

When i add it. The client compiles fine, but when i spawn it on my server. In the client remote i get a T2 error.
